author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Forescout Technologies Reports Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share Of $0.74
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - ForeScout Technologies Inc:
* FORESCOUT TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS STRONG FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.37 TO $0.39
* Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.38
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.45 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $61 MILLION TO $64 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE $59.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $55.9 MILLION
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 REVENUE OF $270.4 MILLION - $280.4 MILLION
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.41, REVENUE VIEW $59.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-1.10, REVENUE VIEW $269.1 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $1.00 TO $1.08 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
